All Classes

Class Description
ActivationGodState
the ActivationGodState class is built in every turn, when each player has to decide if he wants to activate is god card
ActivationGodStateTest  
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
BackgroundPanel
This class chooses the background image for the game, it is used only in the lobby window
BeginTurnState
the BeginTurnState class is built every time the turn is changed
BeginTurnStateTest  
Block
The following class represents the enumeration of the possible Blocks
BlockTest  
Board
The following class represents the game Board
BoardPanel
this class chooses the board image
BoardTest

The following class represents a Box
BoxAlreadyOccupiedException  
BoxTest  
BuildChoice
This class is used to collect the user's choice on where to build
BuildErrorException  
BuildErrorMessage
This class represents the BuildErrorMessage
BuildState
the BuildState class is used every time the player has to build a block, usually after the MoveState.
BuildStateTest  
CardSelectionTest  
CardSelectionWindow
This class represents the window, where the first player can choose the cards that will be used during the game
CheckWinConditionState
The CheckWinConditionState is used every time a player might have won
CheckWinConditionStateTest  
Choice
This abstract class represents the choices, sent by the user
Client  
ClientApp  
Context
The Context contains the logic of the game.
ContextTest  
Controller
The Controller links the model and the virtual view
ControllerTest  
DummyView  
EndTurnState
The EndTurnState is used at the end of each turn.
EndTurnStateTest  
ErrorMessage
This abstract class is used to build error messages when the user makes a wrong choice or does something not permitted by the rules
ExitChoice
this class is used to exit the game
ExitErrorMessage
This class represents the ExitErrorMessage
GameWindow
This class represents the main window of the game, where the actual game takes place
GodActivationChoice
This class is used to activate the chosen god
GodChoice
This class is used to select the chosen god between the ones selected by the first player
GodConditionNotSatisfiedException  
GodNotActionableErrorMessage
This class represents the GodNotActionableErrorMessage
GodsCollectionChoice
This class is used to collect the choice of the gods that will be used in the game, made by the first player
GodSelectionWindow
this class represents the window where, in turn, the second (and third) player can choose his god card
GodsList
This class represents the enumeration of the possible Gods, with a short description of the god effect
GodsListTest  
ImpossibleAddAnotherPlayerException  
InitialPlayerChoice
This class is used to choose the user who will be the first to play
InitialPositionChoice
This class is used to select the initial position of a worker
InitialWorkerPositionErrorMessage
This class represents the InitialWorkerPositionErrorMessage
Lobby
The lobby class handles the creation of a game every time a client register itself in the server he have tu put his name and the number of player whit he or she wants to play the client using the number of players puts the client in a different lobby when the lobby is full the lobby class starts the game: it creates the model,the controller and the virtual view and bound them together following the mvc patter
LobbyWindow
This class represents the initial window of the game, the lobby window, where the players decide their usernames and the number of players they want to play with
MessageToVirtualView
this class represents the message sent to the virtual view the class contains two different objects A modelRepresentation of an ErrorMessage but only one at time instantiated an object MessageToVirtualView due the absence of set methods and the private attributes is not possible change the content of the message
Model
the model class contains the instance of the game it's represents the game and it's modified by the controller the model every time it's modified updates his modelRepresentation and sends it' to the View so it can be seen by the players
ModelRepresentation
an instance of this class is a picture of the model it's used as a container of all the information required by the view to graphically represents the game
ModelRepresentationTest  
ModelTest  
MoveChoice
This class is used to collect the user's choice on where to move

The MoveState is used every time a player has to move.

PingChoice
This class represents the ping choice, sent at regular time intervals to check the availability of the clients

The SetUpState is used just once, at the beginning of the game,

the SocketClientConnection class is the one which handles the socket connection receives the messages and sends them to the controller

this interface contains the general information and methods used by a State
StateEnum
StateEnum represents the enumeration of all the possible states
Tower
the tower class represents a tower built on a box
TowerCompleteException  
TowerTest  
Turn
this class contains the information of a turn
TurnTest  
View
the view class handles the client-side of the application recived a messageToVirtualView establish what the player is supposed to see handling the gui windows
ViewBox
this class represents a box
ViewState
this enumerations contains all the possible states that the view can be in during the game there is a correspondence between the viewStates and the State Classes in the Model
VirtualView
the virtual view class is used in the server-side of the application it receives the choice from the client and sends them to the controller and takes the messageToVirtualView from the model and sends to the clients in this project the virtual view is only the receiver and sender of messages the checks and elaboration methods are implemented in the controller (server-side) or the view (client-side)
WindowInterface  
Worker
the Worker class contains all the information of a worker
